title: [QUESTION] Creating managed-only build from source still supported?
body:
I would like contribute to SkiaSharp, providing PRs. 

The main [SkiaSharp readme](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp#building-skiasharp) only mentions building both the managed and native code.

The wiki still has a guideline of how to build the managed code only, but I can't get this working (with vs2019, on Windows).

Is it still possible to build only the managed code from the cloned SkiaSharp source code?

Thanks a lot,
Peter
